https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zFdP3TVJyFZ1EgGRjYffWHeApOk.jpg Charlie, a down-on-his-luck loner, crosses paths with a blind homeless man who is his exact double. Perplexed and intrigued by the discovery, Charlie invites the man into his life. Burning Shadow
